pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Friday, June 19, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Chelsea, Quebec

10:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will visit Biscotti & cie, to highlight how businesses are benefitting from the Canada Emergency Wage Subsidy and other economic measures. A media availability will follow.

Biscotti & cie
6, chemin Scott

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media to arrive no later than 9:55 a.m.
  • Journalists can dial in to listen and ask questions to the Prime Minister.
  • Participant dial-in numbers:
    Local: 613-954-9003
    Toll-free: 1-866-206-0153
    Pass code: 6822783#

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

The Prime Minister will chair the Cabinet meeting.

Closed to media.
